definition: a base hit at which the batter stops safely at third base, increase threefold, having three units or components or elements
details:
noun
- a base hit at which the batter stops safely at third base
= synonyms: three-base hit
- a quantity that is three times as great as another
- a set of three similar things considered as a unit
= synonyms: triad, trio, triplet
verb
- increase threefold
= synonyms: treble
- hit a three-base hit
adjective
- having three units or components or elements
= synonyms: treble
- three times as great or many
= example: three times as great or many
= synonyms: threefold
